items.sentence: I doubt that Tom knew that Mary was already married.

Tom wasn\'t surprised where he found the lost child.
Tom won\'t have any trouble finding someone to help.
A few days ago, you didn\'t even want to talk to me.

Be careful what you wish for. You just might get it.

The work will take anywhere from two to three weeks.
This is the most beautiful beach in the whole world.
If I were Tom, I would\'ve punched Mary in the face.

Tom will be back in Boston by the middle of October.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice are all in the same class.
I don\'t like carrots, so I don\'t usually eat them.
Nothing would make me happier than to see you happy.
One of the people you were with is a friend of mine.
Good words are worth a lot, but cost almost nothing.

I gave some of my old clothes to the Salvation Army.
I get a three percent commission on anything I sell.
I get nervous when I speak in front of large crowds.
It\'s a pity that I don\'t understand French better.
